title: Offices and Oireachtas Members (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2001 (No. 33
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and 
Holders of Parliamentary and Certain Ministerial Offices) (Amendment) (No. 
2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited oireachtas (allowances) (members holder parliamentary certain ministerial offices) (amendment) (no 2) order 2023

title: Offices and Oireachtas Members (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2001 (No. 33
heading: 2. Article 6 (amended by Article (2)(b) of the Oireachtas (Allowances)
text_raw:
2. Article 6 (amended by Article (2)(b) of the Oireachtas (Allowances) 
(Members and Holders of Parliamentary and Certain Ministerial Offices) 
(Amendment) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 227 of 2023)) of the Oireachtas 
(Allowances) (Members and Holders of Parliamentary and Certain Ministerial 
Offices) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 613 of 2020) is amended by the insertion of the 
following paragraphs after paragraph (5): 

“(6) There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or 
held the position of chairperson of the Oireachtas Committee known as 
the Joint Committee on Assisted Dying an allowance, in respect of the 
member’s duties as holder of that position, annually – 

(a) 

(b) 

at the rate of €10,082 in respect of any period beginning 
on or after 1 October 2022, and 

at the rate of €10,284 in respect of any period beginning 
on or after 1 March 2023, 

during which the member held that position. 

(7) There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or 
held the position of chairperson of the Oireachtas Committee known as 
the Seanad Select Committee on Scrutiny of Draft EU-related Statutory 
Instruments an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of 
that position, annually – 

(a) 

(b) 

at the rate of €10,082 in respect of any period beginning 
on or after 1 October 2022, and 

at the rate of €10,284 in respect of any period beginning 
on or after 1 March 2023, 

during which the member held that position. 

(8) There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or 
held the position of chairperson of the Oireachtas Committee known as 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [480] 3 

the Joint Committee on Key Issues affecting the Traveller Community an 
allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that position, 
annually at the rate of €10,284 in respect of any period beginning on or 
after 1 March 2023, during which the member held that position.”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 September, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [480] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
